RW/NH-39011/30/2015-P&P (Pt-l) dated 15.02.2019 (ii) MoRTH letter no. H-39011/30/2015-P&P (Pt-l) dated 15.02.2019 MoRTH modified the Request for Proposal (RFP) for appointment of Authority / Independent   Engineer in  respect of National Highways and centrally sponsored road works vide letters cited above, which were circulated vide circular dated 25.06.2019 of SRDEQ Division of NHAI (copy enclosed). 2 These RFP documents specify Essential & Preferential Qualifications for the Road Safety Expert to be engaged as Personnel. 3_ In this regard, in order to improve the quality of output, a Sub-para (f) under the essential qualifications for Road Safety Expert shall be incorporated in the RFP for appointment of AE & IE, in all future works as well as ongoing works pending bid due date, which shall read as under: '(f) It is mandatory for the Road Safety Expert to have completed at least 15 days' certification course on Road Safety Audit from IAHE/ IITs/ NITs/ CRRI: The CV of the proposed personnel not having completed minimum 15 days certification course shall not be evaluated. For avoidance of doubt, it is clarified herein that the certification training course may be either from a single institution or from multiple institutions" 4_ All Divisions of NHAI shall adhere to above guidelines while evaluating the bids for appointment of Independent/ Authority Engineer in NHAI's works, in order to uniformity in the evaluation process. 5_ This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 3x (V.K.
